name: semantic-search-nextjs-pinecone-langchain-chatgpt (dabit3)
description: [项目级] Embeds text files into vectors, stores them on Pinecone, and enables semantic search using GPT3 and Langchain in a Next.js UI。来源: https://github.com/dabit3/semantic-search-nextjs-pinecone-langchain-chatgpt

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Embeds text files into vectors, stores them on Pinecone, and enables semantic search using GPT3 and Langchain in a Next.js UI

来源: https://github.com/dabit3/semantic-search-nextjs-pinecone-langchain-chatgpt
